description: test: enable method expression tests in ddd.go

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Wed, Mar 7, 2012 at 8:51 AM,  <iant@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> test: enable method expression tests in ddd.go
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5769044/
>
> Affected files:
>  M test/ddd.go
>
>
> Index: test/ddd.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/test/ddd.go
> +++ b/test/ddd.go
> @@ -219,7 +219,6 @@
>                println("s{&u}.Sum", x)
>                panic("fail")
>        }
> -       /* TODO(rsc): Enable once nested method expressions work.
>        if x := (*U).Sum(&U{}, 1, 3, 5, 2); x != 11 {
>                println("(*U).Sum", x)
>                panic("fail")
> @@ -228,5 +227,4 @@
>                println("U.Sum", x)
>                panic("fail")
>        }
> -       */
>  }
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2056fd2cb0b8 ***
